# kyryl(O.o)rg

Welcome to my homepage!

- URL: [https://kyrylo.org][1]
- Deployment is managed by [Skiff][3].
- HTML and assets are generated by [Jekyll][4].
- Travel HTML and assets are generated by [mdBook][2].

[1]: https://kyrylo.org
[2]: https://github.com/rust-lang/mdBook
[3]: https://github.com/basecamp/kamal-skiff
[4]: https://jekyllrb.com/
